contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox station | name = Ossington | type = TTC Subway Station | style = Bloor–Danforth | image = Ossington TTC tiles.JPG | image_caption = | address = 883 Bloor St. West, [[Toronto]] | country = [[Ontario]], [[Canada]] | coordinates = {{coord|43|39|44|N|79|25|36|W|region:CA-ON_type:railwaystation|display=inline,title}} | line = {{Rail color box|system=TTC|line=Bloor–Danforth}} | other = {{Rail color box|system=TTC|line=TTC buses}} | structure = underground | platform = 2 [[side platform]]s | depth = | levels = | tracks = 2 | parking = | bicycle = | baggage_check = | opened = 25 February 1966 | closed = | rebuilt = | electrified = | ADA = | code = | owned = | zone = | smartcardname = [[Presto card]] | smartcardstatus = No | former = | passengers = {{formatnum:{{TTC ridership|Ossington}}}} | pass_year = {{TTC ridership}} | pass_percent = | pass_system = | mpassengers = | services = {{S-rail|title=TTC}} {{S-line|system=TTC|line=Bloor–Danforth|previous=Dufferin|next=Christie}} }} '''Ossington''' is a [[List of Toronto TTC stations|subway station]] on the [[Bloor–Danforth line]] in [[Toronto]], [[Canada]]. It is located at 883 [[Bloor Street]] West at [[Ossington Avenue]] and opened in 1966. ==Entrances== The main station entrance is on the west side of Ossington Avenue, just north of Bloor. There is a second automatic entrance, which can only be entered using tokens or Metropasses, on Delaware Avenue, beside a TTC [[electrical substation]]. It is planned to have elevators and easier access features in service in 2012.<ref>{{cite web |url=http://www3.ttc.ca/About_the_TTC/Commission_reports_and_information/Commission_meetings/2011/February_2_2011/Supplementary_Reports/Accessible_Transit_S.pdf |title=Accessible Transit Services Plan: 2010 Status Report |author= |date=February 2, 2011 |work= |publisher=Toronto Transit Commission |accessdate=January 2012}}</ref> <!-- ==Nearby landmarks== Nearby landmarks include the expansive Long & McQuade music store. --> == Surface connections == [[File:Ossington Station - TTC.jpg|thumb|left|400px|Bus platforms at Ossington Station]] {{clear left}} {{Main|List of bus routes in Toronto}} * 63 Ossington :: Southbound to [[Liberty Village]] :: Northbound to [[Eglinton West (TTC)|Eglinton West Station]] * 94 Wellesley to [[Castle Frank (TTC)|Castle Frank Station]] * 161 Rogers Road to Jane Street ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== {{Commons category-inline|Ossington (TTC)|Ossington Station}} *{{TTC station page|Ossington|Ossington}} {{TTCstations}} [[Category:Bloor-Danforth Line Stations]] [[Category:Railway stations opened in 1966]]
